FAQ: How can I get my ID card? Answer: You can collect your ID card from the administrative office between 10 AM and 4 PM on working days.
FAQ: Where can I see my timetable? Answer: You can view your personalized timetable on the student portal under the Academics section.
FAQ: Is there Wi-Fi on campus? Answer: Yes
Event: Tech Fest 2025 Description: Annual technical festival with workshops and hackathons
Event: Orientation Session Description: Welcome session for first-year students
